scripts.start: mkdir -p src/_book && cp node_modules/openlayers/css/ol.css src/ && npm run doc:serve
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run doc:build
scripts.archive:en: npm run build && cp src/en/README.md build/openlayers-workshop/en/ && cd build && rm -rf openlayers-workshop/gitbook openlayers-workshop/index.html openlayers-workshop/search_index.json && cp -R openlayers-workshop/en/* openlayers-workshop && rm -rf openlayers-workshop/en/ && zip -r openlayers-workshop.zip openlayers-workshop
scripts.archive:fr: npm run build && cp src/fr/README.md build/openlayers-workshop/fr/ && cd build && rm -rf openlayers-workshop/gitbook openlayers-workshop/index.html openlayers-workshop/search_index.json && cp -R openlayers-workshop/fr/* openlayers-workshop && rm -rf openlayers-workshop/fr/ && zip -r openlayers-workshop.zip openlayers-workshop
